lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Given a list of N words in alphabetic order, find out which one can be written vertically using the first letter of every other one. Then output as explained below.

(If there is more than one solution, favor alphabetic order.)
Input
Line 1: N, the number of words
Next N lines: A word
Output
For each letter of the vertical word: The letter in upper-case + ":" + the matching word (alphabetic order in case of doubt)
Constraints
5 ≤ N ≤ 10
3 ≤ length of each word ≤ 16
Example
Input
5
Best
Brilliant
Excellent
Super
Terrific
Output
B: Brilliant
E: Excellent
S: Super
T: Terrific
